Summary: 2 Golf ball like object hovers then takes northern path
trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Santa Cruz
There was one other sighting in Santa Cruz on or around July 7th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailswhile loading up my family into the car I noticed a two star like objects in the middle of the day they were about a mile apart from each other just above the cloud line I grabbed my wife to confirm or deny what we were seeing, she confirmed and so they hovered for about 20 minutes one of seemed to have dissappeared then the one that remained traveled north with a faster then a jet airliner speed that i've ever seen all the while i saw numerous private planes who all seemed to be travelling from an east to west path who could've seen the same thing but changed when going over the Pacific ocean....if anyone saw something similiar plz post!!!
